item.description:
Official NHC COED Softball Team will be holding a team tryout/practice/ pickup game on Thursday, April, 5th, 2007, at 5pm at Memorial Field in East Haven, CT. approx 5 miles from downtown New Haven. Normal game nights will be Thursday starting in May.

SEVERAL PEOPLE HAVE EXPRESSED INTEREST IN PLAYING ON THE TEAM AND HAVE EVEN ATTENDED A PRACTICE AND THEN I HAVE NEVER HEARD FROM YOU AGAIN. I AM IN THE PROCESS OF MAKING THE FINAL ROSTER AND NEED TO HEAR FROM ANY INTERESTED PLAYERS ASAP. THANKS.

PLease attend even if you will be there after 5pm.

If you are interested in trying out for the team, please attend.

If you are interested in just playing softball or getting some exercise, you are welcome as well.

Memorial Field in located at the intersection of Dodge Avenue and Roma Street, in East Haven.


Mapquest Map
item.name: NHC COED SOFTBALL TEAM TRYOUTS/PRACTICE/PICKUP GAME
